per game share  more modify  share table embed this table get as excel workbook experimentalget table as csv for excelcopy link to table to clipboard about sharing tools video sr sharing tools  howto 340 38 78 482 492 26 37 721 13 52 65 59 20 07 32 24 145player news add your blog posts here player news archive player news rss feed42 the hoops manifesto book review the captain class by sam walker in the captain class sam walker tries to figure out what 330 house of houston houston rockets what to expect next from this team as the season closes the houston rockets have endured a recordbreaking season with 327 always miller time no the pacers shouldnt sign isaiah thomas some people are beginning to chatter and ponder that isaiah thomas 320 last word on sports blueprint for the houston rockets’ nba title hopes every nba title contender must have a blueprint for success 319 always miller time no the pacers shouldnt sign isaiah thomas some people are beginning to chatter and ponder that isaiah thomas  totals share  more modify  share table embed this table get as excel workbook experimentalget table as csv for excelcopy link to table to clipboard about sharing tools video sr mp fg dist 2p 03 310 1016 16 3 3p 2p 03 310 1016 16 3 3p astd fga md astd 3pa 3p att md200001 35 por nba sf 64 2133 451 141 688 295 096 064 233 312 500 619 316 395 453 344 610 037 18 828 215 325 3 0200102 36 por nba sf 62 1996 411 144 705 254 098 093 259 295 455 579 373 321 413 305 542 037 20 815 249 341 1 0200203 37 por nba sf 64 1911 444 132 777 273 109 116 280 223 489 620 431 478 389 286 542 027 15 737 263 286 1 0200304 38 chi nba sf 23 412 379 155 657 207 064 136 250 343 435 586 333 316 400 271 500 007 1 769 146 286 0 0career nba 213 6452 431 140 718 269 098 094 257 282 478 606 374 396 415 311 560 032 54 799 232 317 5 03 seasons por nba 190 6040 435 139 723 274 101 091 257 277 481 607 376 405 416 315 564 033 53 801 240 319 5 01 season chi nba 23 412 379 155 657 207 064 136 250 343 435 586 333 316 400 271 500 007 1 769 146 286 0 0playbyplay playbyplay data available for the 200001 through 201718 seasons playbyplay stats are unofficial minor differences with official season season season age tm lg pos g gs mp fg fga fg 3p 3pa 3p 2p 2pa 2p ft fta ft orb drb trb ast stl blk tov pf pts ortg drtg198788 22 chi nba sf 10 6 294 81 174 465 05 11 500 76 164 462 09 12 714 42 49 91 42 14 14 46 58 176 92 107198889 23 chi nba sf 17 17 619 71 155 462 19 48 393 53 107 492 27 43 640 29 81 110 57 20 14 35 54 189 107 105198990 24 chi nba sf 15 14 612 88 178 495 08 26 323 80 151 525 60 85 710 28 63 91 70 26 16 41 52 244 111 104199091 25 chi nba sf 17 17 704 110 218 504 03 13 235 107 205 521 62 78 792 29 88 117 77 32 15 43 45 285 114 100199192 26 chi nba sf 22 22 899 91 195 468 04 14 probability career 999transactions november 12 1986 traded by the new york knicks as a future 1987 1st round draft pick with a 1990 2nd round draft pick  steve henson was later selected to the seattle super sonics for gerald henderson and a 1987 1st round draft pick  mark jackson was later selected june 22 1987 drafted by the seattle super sonics in the 1st round 5th pick of the 1987 nba draft june 22 1987 traded by the seattle super sonics with a 1989 1st round draft pick  jeff sanders was later selected to the chicago bulls for olden polynice a 1988 2nd round draft pick  sylvester gray was later selected and a 1989 1st round draft pick  b j armstrong was later selected january 22 1999 traded by the chicago bulls to the houston rockets for roy rogers and a 2000 2nd round draft pick  jake voskuhl was later selected october 2 1999 traded by the houston rockets to the portland trail blazers for stacey augmon kelvin cato ed gray carlos rogers brian shaw and walt williams july 20 2003 signed as a free agent with the chicago bulls november 4 2004 waived by the chicago bulls salaries share  more modify  share table embed this table get as excel workbook experimentalget table as csv statistics translations note this is done in an automated way so we apologize for any errors  please report any suggested corrections statistics is included to allow nonenglish speakers to find our statistiques hebrew סקוטי פיפן סטטיסטיקהcroatian scottie pippen statistika armenian սկոտի պիպեն վիճակագրությունindonesian scottie pippen statistik icelandic scottie pippen italian scottie pippen statistiche japanese スコッティ・ピッペン 成績georgian სკოტი პიპენიkorean 스코티 피펜 통계lithuanian scottie pippen statistika latvian skotijs pipens statistika mongolian скотти пиппен статистикdutch scottie pippen
